Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Thai Department of Health did not provide the information for the infographic.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as the Department of Health has refuted that it provided information for the infographic.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the infographic accurately represents the different types of sanitary face masks and their effectiveness, despite the Department of Health stating that it has not been produced according to their official guidelines.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the information presented in the image may not be accurate or reliable, as it was not provided by the Department of Health.
